
add_subdirectory(zlib-external EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)

	set(ZLIB_LIBRARY zlib CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
else()
	set(ZLIB_LIBRARY zlibstatic CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
endif()

set(ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR ${ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR} PARENT_SCOPE)
